title: Why did a remake count toward my placement games?
body:
Rignt now I've played 8 games, 1 being a remake.

Is that good or is it bad because right now im 5-2 in placement games and I really hope that doesn't spoil where ever i get placed.

replies.body:
Unless you're the player that caused the remake, this is simply a *visual error* and **will not count** towards your placement.

I hope that clears up the confusion, please let me know if you have any questions!
No it was the player on another team and even though it says 9 out of 10 placement games left I still have 2?

That's correct, it's just a visual issue at this point. You can ignore what you were seeing about being at 9/10.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

My client crashed in the loading screen and even though I tried restarting League, and then restarting my computer, it wouldn't launch. My team did a remake and looking at my history, it's showing that I'm a leaver. It's a placement game. I submitted a bug report. Does it still count against me???
ik this is late but that is considered your fault so yes it will count.
